article_title: Humana, Hurt By Sovaldi, Sees ACA And Medicare Boon In 2015

article_metadata.description: Humana (HUM) said the high costs of the new hepatitis C pill Sovaldi and investments in government run exchanges where it offers plans under the Affordable Care Act were a drag on third-quarter earnings. Though Humana, like other insurers, is seeing big growth in individual customers who bought Obamacare coverage on [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
